name: Time To Cook, Comrade
description:
GREETINGS, COMRADE! IT IS DEAR LEADER! 

THE PEOPLE ARE HUNGRY, YOU MUST COOK FOR THEM! FOOD TAKES TEN SECONDS TO COOK! DO NOT CHECK YOUR WATCH, I HAVE BANNED ALL TIMEKEEPING DEVICES, AND TIME IN GENERAL! THE PEOPLE NEVER NEEDED IT, COMRADE! 

DRAG FOOD INTO THE CORRECT COOKING DEVICE, AND CLICK THE DEVICE WHEN YOU THINK IT IS READY! DEVIATION FROM THE CORRECT TIME WILL BE DEDUCTED FROM YOUR DEATH CLOCK. YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS WHEN THE DEATH CLOCK RUNS OUT, COMRADE! 

OUR WORKERS (@CHRISSTALLMAN AND @KEVINZUHN) BUILT YOUR KITCHEN OUT OF GAMEMAKER 8.0, SFXR, MUSAGI, AND PHOTOSHOP! 

YOU ARE NOW SATISFIED WITH MY EXPLANATIONS! FURTHER QUESTIONING WILL NOT BE TOLERATED! HOWEVER, PRAISE FOR YOUR LEADER AND REPORTS OF YOUR HIGHEST SCORES ARE APPRECIATED!
